alert.note: Alert for Custer; Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 6:22PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Showers with strong winds will impact portions of eastern Big Horn, Custer, western Powder River, Rosebud and southeastern Treasure Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 619 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with strong winds, extending from 30 miles southwest of Cohagen to 15 miles west of Colstrip to 11 miles south of Lodge Grass. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miles City, Colstrip, Forsyth, Lame Deer, Volborg, Ashland, Busby, Rosebud, Birney, Angela, Cartersville, Hathaway, Sonnette, Brandenberg, Kirby, Rosebud Battlefield Park, Tongue River Reservoir, Strawberry Hill Recreation Area, Matthews Recreation Area and Birney Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Custer; Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud; Treasure
